section.title: label forms creating new Label Form
section.para: To create a new Label Form definition, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Label Form definition, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique Label Form name.
Specify the report definition you want to associate with the Label Form.

tip.para: In the case where you have multiple versions (i.e., grades) of the same-named report definition, it doesn't matter which one you select when setting up a Form. The system will always use the report definition having the highest grade.

listitem.para: Select a value between 1 and 99 using the arrow buttons located to the right of the field.
Value entered dictates the number of Label Forms to be printed per page.
